name: Puppy & Kitty Fashion Salon
description:
If you like the fun of playing with your favorite puppy pet and love the animal fashion, this hair salon game is for you! Play to change the hairstyle of your animal as if you were a professional hairdresser! Take care of the cute and furry animal and change its haircut in this beauty and makeover game!

Take your puppy to the pet hair salon now and start having fun changing the look and the hair color to the poodle. There are many combinations of fashion hair care tools you can use to take care of the hair of your dog and turn it into the perfect puppy pet! Start playing in this fashion pet and animal hairstyle salon!

Wash the fluffy hair of your puppy pet in the salon so he can be ready for changing his hairstyle and hair color or haircut. Take the scissors and unleash your animal fashion hairdresser creativity! Apply some changes and colors here and there, use some hair complements, comb the fluffy hair and make your puppy to look like a superstar thanks to your hair stylist skills! Show off them in this animal fashion salon!

Features:
- Amazing high definition graphics and sounds!
- Many professional hairstyle tools for you to use with your puppy pet!
- Simple and intuitive hair salon game for girls of all ages!
- Take pictures of your hairstyle designs and your pets and share with your friends!
- Become the best pet hairstyle professional in this animal fashion salon!

Have fun with these lovely animals in this fashion salon! Become the best animal hairdresser in town and go for a walk with your fashion puppy pet. Play now!
